page.title: 06ASPECTS OF SCHOOL IN G'M
page.content: I am an 11 year old girl and these are the things I like about school: I like maths because it's good fun and sometimes my friend and I get different answers.Our teacher explains it clearly so we know what to do,but one boy sometimes fiddles and does it wrong and our teacher gets mad with him. I like drama.Drama is brilliant because we can act.I like acting a lot.Our teacher gives us a situation and then we go away and improvise on it for about 10 minutes.Our teacher usually thinks our plays are funny.I like doing drama in groups. I like doing topics.These are fun when you have to find out about things. I like Scripture,but my best friend hates it.I like learning about parables. I like reading.
